thread.title: Angela Baird PA
thread.title_full: macs4u.com reviewed by Angela Baird PA

author: Angela Baird PA
title: Angela Baird PA
text: I wish I would have wrote this review sooner and I came across this email realizing I never rated macs4u.com. I bought my son a desk top mac for Xmas 2016 and its been great. It runs like a dream and looks bran new! No problems love it so much that I need to buy myself one. When I was trying to pick out the best Mac for my son your company was very helpful and answered all the questions I needed to pick what would be best suited for our son. Thanks so much will be buying from you again !
